Desc.eng: Van Helsing! Finally a visitor in this sadly abandoned hall of worship. What brings you here?
I don’t know why, but I feel that an honest prayer would be ointment on the bruises on my battle-hardened soul.
And I was considering confessing all the sins I’ve been carrying with this ethereal body. Which makes me really confused.
What…? Are you..? Oh, my! You have found the gem! And it works! It still works! Please, give it to me. I will use it wisely.
